trans-unit.source: To help protect against Mass Assignment Attacks, the Model class requires that you list all of the field names that can be changed during inserts and updates in the $allowedFields class property. Any data provided in addition to these will be removed prior to hitting the database. This is great for ensuring that timestamps, or primary keys do not get changed.
trans-unit.target: 为了帮助防止大规模分配攻击，Model类要求您在 $allowedFields 类属性中列出所有在插入和更新期间可以更改的字段名称。除这些数据外，在访问数据库之前，还将删除所有提供的数据。这对于确保不更改时间戳或主键非常有用。

trans-unit.source: To make auto-discovery work for our Blog namespace, we need to make one small adjustment. Acme needs to be changed to Acme\Blog because each “module” within the namespace needs to be fully defined. Once your module folder path is defined, the discovery process would look for discoverable items on that path and should, for example, find the routes file at /acme/Blog/Config/Routes.php.
trans-unit.target: 要使自动发现适用于Blog命名空间，我们需要进行一些小的调整。Acme需要更改为Acme \ Blog，因为名称空间中的每个“模块”都需要完全定义。定义模块文件夹路径后，发现过程将在该路径上寻找可发现的项目，例如，应在/acme/Blog/Config/Routes.php上找到路由文件。

trans-unit.source: To make services work well, you have to be able to rely on each class having a constant API, or interface, to use. Almost all of CodeIgniter’s classes provide an interface that they adhere to. When you want to extend or replace core classes, you only need to ensure you meet the requirements of the interface and you know that the classes are compatible.

trans-unit.source: Traditionally, transactions have required a fair amount of work to implement since they demand that you keep track of your queries and determine whether to commit or rollback based on the success or failure of your queries. This is particularly cumbersome with nested queries. In contrast, we’ve implemented a smart transaction system that does all this for you automatically (you can also manage your transactions manually if you choose to, but there’s really no benefit).
trans-unit.target: 传统上，事务需要执行大量工作，因为它们要求您跟踪查询并根据查询的成功或失败来确定是提交还是回退。对于嵌套查询，这尤其麻烦。相反，我们实现了一个智能交易系统，该系统会自动为您完成所有这些操作（如果您愿意，也可以手动管理交易，但实际上没有任何好处）。

trans-unit.source: Truly light weight. The core system requires only a few very small libraries. This is in stark contrast to many frameworks that require significantly more resources. Additional libraries are loaded dynamically upon request, based on your needs for a given process, so the base system is very lean and quite fast.
trans-unit.target: 真正的轻量级。核心系统只需要几个非常小的库。这与许多需要更多资源的框架形成了鲜明的对比。根据你对特定进程的需求,额外的库是根据请求动态加载的,所以基本系统非常精简,速度相当快。

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances you won’t even notice the Output class since it works transparently without your intervention. For example, when you use the Loader class to load a view file, it’s automatically passed to the Output class, which will be called automatically by CodeIgniter at the end of system execution. It is possible, however, for you to manually intervene with the output if you need to.
trans-unit.target: 在正常情况下，您甚至不会注意到Output类，因为它无需您干预即可透明地工作。例如，当您使用Loader类加载视图文件时，它会自动传递给Output类，CodeIgniter将在系统执行结束时自动调用该类。但是，您可以根据需要手动干预输出。

trans-unit.target: Unlike failUnauthorized , this method should be used when the requested API endpoint is never allowed. Unauthorized implies the client is encouraged to try again with different credentials. Forbidden means the client should not try again because it won’t help. Status code is 403.

trans-unit.source: Unlike caching from the Output Class, the driver file-based caching allows for pieces of view files to be cached. Use this with care, and make sure to benchmark your application, as a point can come where disk I/O will negate positive gains by caching.
trans-unit.target: 与来自输出类的缓存不同,基于驱动文件的缓存允许缓存视图文件的碎片。请谨慎使用,并确保对您的应用程序进行基准测试,因为磁盘I/O会抵消缓存带来的积极收益。

trans-unit.source: Unlike caching from the Output Class, the driver file-based caching allows for pieces of view files to be cached. Use this with care, and make sure to benchmark your application, as a point can come where disk I/O will negate positive gains by caching. This requires a writable cache directory to be really writable (0777).
trans-unit.target: 与来自输出类的缓存不同,基于驱动文件的缓存允许缓存视图文件的碎片。谨慎使用这个功能,并确保对您的应用程序进行基准测试,因为一个点可能会出现,磁盘I/O会否定缓存带来的正收益。这需要一个可写的缓存目录,才能真正做到可写(0777)。

trans-unit.source: Unlike many other frameworks, CodeIgniter configurable items aren’t contained in a single file. Instead, each class that needs configurable items will have a configuration file with the same name as the class that uses it. You will find the application configuration files in the /app/Config folder.
trans-unit.target: Unlike many other frameworks, CodeIgniter configurable items aren’t contained in a single file. Instead, each class that needs configurable items will have a configuration file with the same name as the class that uses it. You will find the application configuration files in the /app/Config folder.

trans-unit.source: Unlike most other systems in CodeIgniter, Helpers are not written in an Object Oriented format. They are simple, procedural functions. Each helper function performs one specific task, with no dependence on other functions.
trans-unit.target: 与CodeIgniter中的大多数其他系统不同,Helpers不是以面向对象的格式编写的。它们是简单的、程序化的函数。每个助手函数只执行一个特定的任务,不依赖于其他函数。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most systems in CodeIgniter, the error functions are simple procedural interfaces that are available globally throughout the application. This approach permits error messages to get triggered without having to worry about class/function scoping.
trans-unit.target: 与CodeIgniter中的大多数系统不同,错误函数是简单的程序接口,在整个应用程序中全局可用。这种方法允许错误信息被触发,而不必担心类/函数的范围。

trans-unit.source: Use Allman style indenting. With the exception of Class declarations, braces are always placed on a line by themselves, and indented at the same level as the control statement that “owns” them.
trans-unit.target: 使用Allman样式缩进。除Class声明外，大括号始终始终放在一行上，并与“拥有”它们的控制语句在同一级别缩进。

trans-unit.source: Use Defined Routes Only
trans-unit.target: 仅使用定义的路线

trans-unit.source: Use a descriptive subject line (eg parser library chokes on commas) rather than a vague one (eg. your code broke).
trans-unit.target: 使用描述性的主题行(例如:解析器库被逗号噎住了),而不是一个模糊的主题行(例如:你的代码坏了)。

trans-unit.source: Use of the || “or” comparison operator is discouraged, as its clarity on some output devices is low (looking like the number 11, for instance). && is preferred over AND but either are acceptable, and a space should always precede and follow !.
trans-unit.target: || 的使用 不鼓励使用“或”比较运算符，因为它在某些输出设备上的清晰度很低（例如，看起来像数字11）。 && 比 AND 更可取，但可以接受，并且始终应在前面和后面加一个空格 ! 。

trans-unit.source: Use separate files for each class, unless the classes are closely related. An example of a CodeIgniter file that contains multiple classes is the Xmlrpc library file.
trans-unit.target: 除非这些类紧密相关，否则请为每个类使用单独的文件。Xmlrpc库文件是包含多个类的CodeIgniter文件的示例。

trans-unit.source: Use single line comments within code, leaving a blank line between large comment blocks and code.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中使用单行注释,在大的注释块和代码之间留有空行。

trans-unit.source: Use tabs for whitespace in your code, not spaces. This may seem like a small thing, but using tabs instead of whitespace allows the developer looking at your code to have indentation at levels that they prefer and customize in whatever application they use. And as a side benefit, it results in (slightly) more compact files, storing one tab character versus, say, four space characters.
trans-unit.target: 在你的代码中使用制表符来代替空白,而不是空格。这似乎是一件小事,但使用制表符而不是空格,可以让开发人员在查看您的代码时,根据他们的喜好和他们所使用的任何应用程序来定制缩进程度。而且作为一个附带的好处,它导致(略微)更紧凑的文件,存储一个tab字符,而不是说四个空格字符。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the credit card number matches the format used by the specified provider. Current supported providers are: American Express (amex), China Unionpay (unionpay), Diners Club CarteBlance (carteblanche), Diners Club (dinersclub), Discover Card (discover), Interpayment (interpayment), JCB (jcb), Maestro (maestro), Dankort (dankort), NSPK MIR (mir), Troy (troy), MasterCard (mastercard), Visa (visa), UATP (uatp), Verve (verve), CIBC Convenience Card (cibc), Royal Bank of Canada Client Card (rbc), TD Canada Trust Access Card (tdtrust), Scotiabank Scotia Card (scotia), BMO ABM Card (bmoabm), HSBC Canada Card (hsbc)
trans-unit.target: 验证信用卡号码是否符合指定供应商使用的格式。目前支持的供应商有 美国运通(amex)、中国银联(unionpay)、Diners Club CarteBlanche(carteblanche)、Diners Club(dinersclub)、Discover Card(discover)、Interpayment(interpayment)、JCB(jcb)、Maestro(maestro)、Dankort(dankort)、NSPK MIR(mir)、Troy(troy)。万事达卡(Mastercard)、维萨卡(visa)、UATP(uatp)、Verve(verve)、CIBC便利卡(cibc)、加拿大皇家银行客户卡(rbc)、道明加拿大信托准入卡(tdtrust)、丰业银行Scotia卡(scotia)、BMO ABM卡(bmoabm)、汇丰加拿大卡(hsbc)

trans-unit.source: Verify that the data is of the correct type, and meets the correct criteria. For example, if a username is submitted it must be validated to contain only permitted characters. It must be of a minimum length, and not exceed a maximum length. The username can’t be someone else’s existing username, or perhaps even a reserved word. Etc.
trans-unit.target: 验证数据的类型正确，并且符合正确的条件。例如，如果提交了用户名，则必须对其进行验证以仅包含允许的字符。它必须具有最小长度，并且不能超过最大长度。用户名不能是别人的现有用户名，甚至不能是保留字。等等。

trans-unit.source: View Cells allow you to insert HTML that is generated outside of your controller. It simply calls the specified class and method, which must return a string of valid HTML. This method could be in any callable method, found in any class that the autoloader can locate. The only restriction is that the class can not have any constructor parameters. This is intended to be used within views, and is a great aid to modularizing your code.
trans-unit.target: 视图单元格允许你插入在控制器之外生成的HTML。它只是简单地调用指定的类和方法,它必须返回一串有效的HTML。这个方法可以在任何可调用的方法中,在自动加载器可以找到的任何类中找到。唯一的限制是该类不能有任何构造参数。这是为了在视图中使用,对代码的模块化有很大的帮助。

trans-unit.source: View parameters are passed to setData() as an associative array of data to be replaced in the template. trans-unit.target: 视图参数作为要在模板中替换的数据的关联数组传递给 setData() 。在上面的示例中，模板将包含两个变量：{blog_title}和{blog_heading} render() 的第一个参数包含视图文件的名称，其中blog_template是视图文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: View partials are view files that do not extend any layout. They typically include content that can be reused from view to view. When using view layouts you must use $this->include() to include any view partials.
trans-unit.target: 视图局部视图是不扩展任何布局的视图文件。它们通常包含可在视图之间重复使用的内容。使用视图布局时，必须使用 $this->include() 包含所有视图局部视图。

trans-unit.source: Views are generally stored in /app/Views, but can quickly become unwieldy if not organized in some fashion. CodeIgniter does not enforce any type of organization, but a good rule of thumb would be to create a new directory in the Views directory for each controller. Then, name views by the method name. This makes them very easy to find later on. For example, a user’s profile might be displayed in a controller named User, and a method named profile. You might store the view file for this method in /app/Views/User/Profile.php.
trans-unit.target: 视图通常存储在/ app / Views中，但是如果不以某种方式进行组织，则会很快变得笨拙。 CodeIgniter不强制执行任何类型的组织，但是一个很好的经验法则是在Views目录中为每个控制器创建一个新目录。然后，以方法名称命名视图。这使得以后很容易找到它们。例如，用户的配置文件可能显示在名为 User 的控制器和名为 profile 的方法中。您可以将此方法的视图文件存储在/app/Views/User/Profile.php中。

trans-unit.source: Views are never called directly, they must be loaded by a controller. Remember that in an MVC framework, the Controller acts as the traffic cop, so it is responsible for fetching a particular view. If you have not read the Controllers page you should do so before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 视图从不直接调用，它们必须由controller加载。请记住，在MVC框架中，Controller充当交通警察，因此它负责获取特定视图。如果您尚未阅读Controllers页面，则应先阅读该内容，然后再继续。

trans-unit.source: Views are never called directly, they must be loaded by a controller. Remember that in an MVC framework, the Controller acts as the traffic cop, so it is responsible for fetching a particular view. If you have not read the Controllers page, you should do so before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 视图从不直接调用，它们必须由控制器加载。请记住，在MVC框架中，Controller充当交通警察，因此它负责获取特定视图。如果尚未阅读“控制器”页面，则应先阅读该内容，然后再继续。

trans-unit.source: Views are the simplest files and are typically HTML with very small amounts of PHP. The PHP should be very simple, usually just displaying a variable’s contents, or looping over some items and displaying their information in a table.
trans-unit.target: 视图是最简单的文件，通常是HTML，带有少量PHP。PHP应该非常简单，通常只显示变量的内容，或者遍历某些项并在表中显示其信息。

trans-unit.source: Views can be loaded using the class namespace as described in the views documentation:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用类名称空间来加载视图，如视图文档中所述：

trans-unit.source: Views get the data to display from the controllers, who pass it to the views as variables that can be displayed with simple echo calls. You can also display other views within a view, making it pretty simple to display a common header or footer on every page.
trans-unit.target: 视图从控制器获取要显示的数据，控制器将这些数据作为变量传递给视图，这些变量可以通过简单的 echo 调用显示。您还可以在视图中显示其他视图，从而使在每个页面上显示通用的页眉或页脚非常简单。

trans-unit.source: When debug is passed and set to true, this will enable additional debugging to echo to STDERR during the script execution. This is done by passing CURLOPT_VERBOSE and echoing the output. So, when you’re running a built-in server via spark serve you will see the output in the console. Otherwise, the output will be written to the server’s error log.
trans-unit.target: 通过 debug 并将其设置为 true 时，这将允许其他调试在脚本执行期间回显到STDERR。这是通过传递CURLOPT_VERBOSE并回显输出来完成的。因此，当您通过 spark serve 运行内置服务器时，将在控制台中看到输出。否则，输出将被写入服务器的错误日志。

trans-unit.source: When a page is loaded, the session class will check to see if a valid session cookie is sent by the user’s browser. If a sessions cookie does not exist (or if it doesn’t match one stored on the server or has expired) a new session will be created and saved.
trans-unit.target: 加载页面后，会话类将检查用户的浏览器是否发送了有效的会话cookie。如果会话Cookie并不不存在（或者如果它不匹配一个存储在服务器上或已过期）的新会话将被创建和保存。

trans-unit.source: When a page is loaded, the session class will check to see if valid session cookie is sent by the user’s browser. If a sessions cookie does not exist (or if it doesn’t match one stored on the server or has expired) a new session will be created and saved.
trans-unit.target: 加载页面后，会话类将检查用户的浏览器是否发送了有效的会话cookie。如果会话Cookie并不不存在（或者如果它不匹配一个存储在服务器上或已过期）的新会话将被创建和保存。

trans-unit.source: When a page is not found that matches the current URI, the system will show a generic 404 view. You can change what happens by specifying an action to happen with the set404Override() option. The value can be either a valid class/method pair, just like you would show in any route, or a Closure:
trans-unit.target: 当找不到与当前URI匹配的页面时，系统将显示通用404视图。您可以通过使用 set404Override() 选项指定要发生的操作来更改发生的情况。该值可以是有效的类/方法对，就像您在任何路径中显示的一样，也可以是闭包：

trans-unit.source: When a relative URI is provided to the request() method or any of the shortcut methods, it will be combined with the baseURI according to the rules described by RFC 2986, section 2. To save you some time, here are some examples of how the combinations are resolved.
trans-unit.target: 当将相对URI提供给 request() 方法或任何快捷方法时，它将根据RFC 2986第2节描述的规则与baseURI组合。为了节省您的时间，以下是一些如何解决组合的示例。

trans-unit.source: When a request fails the CSRF validation check, it will redirect to the previous page by default, setting an error flash message that you can display to the end user. This provides a nicer experience than simply crashing. This can be turned off by editing the $CSRFRedirect value in app/Config/App.php:
trans-unit.target: 当请求未通过CSRF验证检查时，默认情况下它将重定向到上一页，并设置一条 error 刷新消息，您可以将其显示给最终用户。这提供了比简单崩溃更好的体验。这可以通过编辑app / Config / App.php中的 $CSRFRedirect 值来关闭：

trans-unit.source: When a rule group is named identically to a controller class/method it will be used automatically when the run() method is invoked from that class/method.
trans-unit.target: 如果规则组的名称与控制器类/方法的名称相同，则从该类/方法调用 run() 方法时将自动使用该规则组。

trans-unit.source: When a user visits the root of your site (i.e. example.com) the controller to use is determined by the value set by the setDefaultController() method, unless a route exists for it explicitly. The default value for this is Home which matches the controller at /app/Controllers/Home.php:
trans-unit.target: 当用户访问您网站的根目录（例如example.com）时，要使用的控制器由 setDefaultController() 方法设置的值确定，除非为其明确存在路由。默认值为 Home ，它与 /app/Controllers/Home.php 中的控制器匹配：

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the response object will contain an instance of CodeIgniter\HTTP\ContentSecurityPolicy. The values set in app/Config/ContentSecurityPolicy.php are applied to that instance, and if no changes are needed during runtime, then the correctly formatted header is sent and you’re all done.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，响应对象将包含 CodeIgniter\HTTP\ContentSecurityPolicy 的实例。在app / Config / ContentSecurityPolicy.php中设置的值将应用于该实例，如果在运行时不需要任何更改，则将发送格式正确的标头，您已完成所有工作。

trans-unit.source: When making changes to a view it can be inconvenient to have the field id in the controller. To work around this, you can give your smiley links a generic name that will be tied to a specific id in your view.

trans-unit.source: When manually specifying routes, it is recommended to disable auto-routing by setting $routes->setAutoRoute(false); in the Routes.php file. This ensures that only routes you define can be accessed.

trans-unit.source: When matching a controller to a route, the router will add the default namespace value to the front of the controller specified by the route. By default, this value is empty, which leaves each route to specify the fully namespaced controller:
trans-unit.target: 当将控制器与路由匹配时,路由器会在路由指定的控制器前面添加默认的命名空间值。默认情况下,这个值是空的,这样每个路由就可以指定完全命名空间的控制器。

trans-unit.source: When more than $batch_size field/value pairs are provided, multiple queries will be executed, each handling up to $batch_size field/value pairs.

trans-unit.source: When run, this method first grabs an instance of the throttler. Next, it uses the IP address as the bucket name, and sets things to limit them to one request per second. If the throttler rejects the check, returning false, then we return a Response with the status code set to 429 - Too Many Attempts, and the script execution ends before it ever hits the controller. This example will throttle based on a single IP address across all requests made to the site, not per page.
trans-unit.target: 运行时,这个方法首先会抓取一个节制器的实例。接下来,它使用IP地址作为桶名,并设置事情限制为每秒一个请求。如果节制器拒绝检查,返回false,那么我们就返回一个状态码设置为429的Response--Too Many Attempts,脚本的执行就会在到达控制器之前结束。这个例子将基于单个IP地址对网站的所有请求进行节制,而不是每个页面。

trans-unit.source: When running database tests, you need to provide a database that can be used during testing. Instead of using the PHPUnit built-in database features, the framework provides tools specific to CodeIgniter. The first step is to ensure that you have set up a tests database group in app/Config/Database.php. This specifies a database connection that is only used while running tests, to keep your other data safe.
trans-unit.target: 在运行数据库测试时，您需要提供一个可以在测试期间使用的数据库。该框架提供了特定于CodeIgniter的工具，而不是使用PHPUnit内置的数据库功能。第一步是确保您已在app / Config / Database.php中设置了 tests 数据库组。这指定了仅在运行测试时使用的数据库连接，以确保其他数据的安全。

trans-unit.source: When running tests, you need to ensure that your database has the correct schema set up and that it is in a known state for every test. You can use migrations and seeds to set up your database, by adding a couple of class properties to your test.
trans-unit.target: 当运行测试时,你需要确保你的数据库有正确的模式设置,并且每次测试时它都处于已知状态。你可以使用迁移和种子来设置你的数据库,通过向你的测试添加几个类属性。

trans-unit.source: When using the -all option, it will scan through all namespaces attempting to find any migrations that have not been run. These will all be collected and then sorted as a group by date created. This should help to minimize any potential conflicts between the main application and any modules.
trans-unit.target: 使用 -all 选项时，它将扫描所有名称空间，以尝试查找尚未运行的任何迁移。这些都将被收集，然后按创建日期按组进行排序。这应该有助于最大程度地减少主应用程序与任何模块之间的任何潜在冲突。

trans-unit.source: When we use the term “Libraries” we are normally referring to the classes that are located in the libraries directory and described in the Class Reference of this user guide. In this case, however, we will instead describe how you can create your own libraries within your application/libraries directory in order to maintain separation between your local resources and the global framework resources.
trans-unit.target: 当我们使用术语“库”时，通常是指位于库目录中并在本用户指南的类参考中描述的类。但是，在这种情况下，我们将描述如何在application / libraries目录中创建自己的库，以保持本地资源和全局框架资源之间的分隔。

trans-unit.source: When working with HTML forms you can only use GET or POST HTTP verbs. In most cases, this is just fine. However, to support REST-ful routing you need to support other, more correct, verbs, like DELETE or PUT. Since the browsers don’t support this, CodeIgniter provides you with a way to spoof the method that is being used. This allows you to make a POST request, but tell the application that it should be treated as a different request type.
trans-unit.target: 使用HTML表单时，只能使用GET或POST HTTP动词。在大多数情况下，这很好。但是，要支持基于REST的路由，您需要支持其他更正确的动词，例如DELETE或PUT。由于浏览器不支持此功能，因此CodeIgniter为您提供了一种欺骗所使用方法的方法。这允许您发出POST请求，但告诉应用程序应将其视为其他请求类型。

trans-unit.source: When working with other libraries that provide a DateTime instance, you can use this method to convert that to a Time instance, optionally setting the locale. The timezone will be automatically determined from the DateTime instance passed in:

trans-unit.source: When you upload files they can be accessed natively in PHP through the $_FILES superglobal. This array has some major shortcomings when working with multiple files uploaded at once, and has potential security flaws many developers are not aware of. CodeIgniter helps with both of these situations by standardizing your usage of files behind a common interface.
trans-unit.target: 当您上传文件时，可以通过 $_FILES 超全局性在PHP中以本地方式访问它们。当处理一次上传的多个文件时，此阵列存在一些主要缺点，并且存在许多开发人员未意识到的潜在安全漏洞。CodeIgniter通过在公共接口后面对文件的使用进行标准化来帮助解决这两种情况。

trans-unit.source: When your application runs, .env will be loaded automatically, and the variables put into the environment. trans-unit.target: 当您的应用程序运行时，.env将自动加载，并将变量放入环境中。如果环境中已存在变量，则不会覆盖该变量。可使用以下任意一种来访问已加载的Environment变量： getenv() ， $_SERVER 或 $_ENV 。

trans-unit.source: When your configuration object is instantiated, it will loop over the designated classes in $registrars. For each of these classes, which contains a method name matching the configuration class, it will invoke that method, and incorporate any returned properties the same way as described for namespaced variables.

trans-unit.source: When your controller is finished using resources from an application package, and particularly if you have other application packages you want to work with, you may wish to remove the package path so the Loader no longer looks in that directory for resources. To remove the last path added, simply call the method with no parameters.

trans-unit.source: When your tables include Foreign Keys, migrations can often cause problems as you attempt to drop tables and columns. To temporarily bypass the foreign key checks while running migrations, use the disableForeignKeyChecks() and enableForeignKeyChecks() methods on the database connection.
trans-unit.target: 当表中包含外键时，在尝试删除表和列时，迁移通常会引起问题。要临时绕行外键检查，同时运行的迁移，使用 disableForeignKeyChecks() 和 enableForeignKeyChecks() 方法的数据库连接上。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you create an application, you have to find a way to organize the code to make it simple to locate the proper files and make it simple to maintain. Like most of the web frameworks, CodeIgniter uses the Model, View, Controller (MVC) pattern to organize the files. This keeps the data, the presentation, and flow through the application as separate parts. It should be noted that there are many views on the exact roles of each element, but this document describes our take on it. If you think of it differently, you’re free to modify how you use each piece as you need.
trans-unit.target: 每当您创建应用程序时，都必须找到一种组织代码的方法，以使其易于找到合适的文件并使其易于维护。与大多数Web框架一样，CodeIgniter使用“模型，视图，控制器（MVC）”模式来组织文件。这会将数据，演示文稿和流作为单独的部分保留在应用程序中。应该注意的是，对于每个元素的确切角色有很多看法，但是本文描述了我们对此的看法。如果您有不同的看法，则可以根据需要随意修改每件作品的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: Where possible, CodeIgniter has been kept as flexible as possible, allowing you to work in the way you want, not being forced into working any certain way. The framework can have core parts easily extended or completely replaced to make the system work the way you need it to. In short, CodeIgniter is the malleable framework that tries to provide the tools you need while staying out of the way.
trans-unit.target: 在可能的情况下,CodeIgniter已经尽可能的保持了灵活性,允许你以你想要的方式工作,而不是被强迫以任何特定的方式工作。框架的核心部分可以很容易地扩展或完全替换,使系统按照你的需要工作。简而言之,CodeIgniter是一个可塑性很强的框架,它试图提供你所需要的工具,同时又不妨碍你的工作。

trans-unit.target: 虽然相当简单,但这些例子表明,使用Entity类可以提供一种非常灵活的方式来执行业务逻辑,并创建易于使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: While not “true” caching, Query Builder enables you to save (or “cache”) certain parts of your queries for reuse at a later point in your script’s execution. Normally, when an Query Builder call is completed, all stored information is reset for the next call. With caching, you can prevent this reset, and reuse information easily.
trans-unit.target: 尽管不是“真正的”缓存，但查询生成器使您能够保存（或“缓存”）查询的某些部分，以在脚本执行的稍后时间重用。通常，当查询生成器调用完成时，将为下一个调用重置所有存储的信息。通过缓存，您可以防止这种重置，并轻松地重用信息。

trans-unit.source: While the add() method is convenient, it is recommended to always use the HTTP-verb-based routes, described below, as it is more secure. It will also provide a slight performance increase, since only routes that match the current request method are stored, resulting in fewer routes to scan through when trying to find a match.

trans-unit.source: While the write() command will write a single line to the terminal, ending it with a EOL character, you can use the color() method to make a string fragment that can be used in the same way, except that it will not force an EOL after printing. This allows you to create multiple outputs on the same row. Or, more commonly, you can use it inside of a write() method to create a string of a different color inside:
trans-unit.target: 尽管 write() 命令将单行写入终端，并以EOL字符结尾，但是您可以使用 color() 方法来创建可以以相同方式使用的字符串片段，只是不会强制打印后的EOL。这使您可以在同一行上创建多个输出。或者，更常见的是，您可以在 write() 方法内部使用它在内部创建不同颜色的字符串：

trans-unit.source: While the ability to use cli commands like any other route is convenient, you might find times where you need a little something different. That’s where CLI Commands come in. They are simple classes that do not need to have routes defined for, making them perfect for building tools that developers can use to make their jobs simpler, whether by handling migrations or database seeding, checking cronjob status, or even building out custom code generators for your company.
trans-unit.target: 尽管使用cli命令像其他路线一样方便，但是您可能会发现需要一些其他东西的时候。这就是CLI命令的来源。它们是简单的类，不需要为之定义路由，因此非常适合构建工具，开发人员可以使用这些工具来简化工作，无论是通过处理迁移或数据库种子，检查cronjob状态还是甚至为您的公司构建自定义代码生成器。

trans-unit.source: While the add() method is simple to use, it is often handier to work with multiple routes at once, using the map() method. trans-unit.target: 尽管add（）方法易于使用，但使用 map() 方法一次处理多个路由通常更方便。您可以定义路由数组，然后将其作为第一个参数传递给 map() 方法，而不是为需要 add() 的每个路由调用add （）方法：

trans-unit.source: While the examples above are convenient, they don’t help enforce any business logic. The base Entity class implements some smart __get() and __set() methods that will check for special methods and use those instead of using the attributes directly, allowing you to enforce any business logic or data conversion that you need.
trans-unit.target: 尽管上面的示例很方便，但是它们并不能帮助您实施任何业务逻辑。基本的Entity类实现了一些聪明的 __get() 和 __set() 方法，这些方法将检查特殊方法并使用这些方法而不是直接使用属性，从而使您能够执行所需的任何业务逻辑或数据转换。

trans-unit.source: While using XDebug and a good IDE can be indispensable to debug your application, sometimes a quick var_dump() is all you need. CodeIgniter makes that even better by bundling in the excellent Kint debugging tool for PHP. This goes way beyond your usual tool, providing many alternate pieces of data, like formatting timestamps into recognizable dates, showing you hexcodes as colors, display array data like a table for easy reading, and much, much more.
trans-unit.target: 虽然使用XDebug和良好的IDE调试应用程序必不可少，但有时只需要快速的 var_dump() 。通过捆绑用于PHP的出色Kint调试工具，CodeIgniter使这一点变得更好。这远远超出了您通常使用的工具，它提供了许多备用数据，例如将时间戳记格式化为可识别的日期，将十六进制代码显示为颜色，将数组数据显示为表格以便于阅读等等。

trans-unit.source: Why are we telling you this? Because it is likely that after trying to find the reason for your performance issues, you may conclude that locking is the issue and therefore look into how to remove the locks …
